MajorClaims.Text: I completely disagree with this statement that we should replace normal course with online course
I personally disagree this this notion that we should replace classroom with online class

Claims.Text: it should not replace classroom learning
learning in classroom could provide more information and make students more comprehend in subjects that they had learnt
online class could not provide knowledge about social skills
learning in classroom, student could have healthier life
having classroom could provide abundant skills to students

Premises.Text: Learning in classroom could provide more information to study
learning in classroom are not only learning academic skills but also learning social skills, and learning how to solve problem in real situation
in classroom have many equipment to demonstrate real example
in biology class, learning anatomy by operating fog have many benefits
Learner could learn how to use tools and see actual organs of fog
online class just only study in textbook not learnin real situation
This important skill cannot be gotten in online classes
In a classroom, teacher could give assignment to student to work as a group
This could help students to learn how to deal with people, how to collaborate with people in their group
in school can provide exercise class which train student to move their body
Classroom have specialist trainer to teach students to it right way
If student do it by themselves, they might be hurt themselves
This make students have healthier life which online class cannot provide
classroom could provide real actual example to make students more understand in their subject
classroom courses are also provide students to learn social skill
classroom could provide exercise class to set students to have a good health
